title: The Cloudspotter's Guide - paragraph 4 points out

content.question: Paragraph 4 ("Ironically ... contrails") point out

choices.label: an unexpected consequence of a technological improvement
an innovative strategy for evaluating the effects of contrails
an elegant design solution for a puzzling problem
the consequences of failing to follow a carefully designed plan

content.answer: an unexpected consequence of a technological improvement

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
